attributes.action: STOP ADVERTISING dogs free to good homes
attributes.additional_details: Dogs that are offered as "free to good home" in press and on internet sites regularly end up being used as "bait" for training fighting dogs. They are then left dead or seriously injured and dumped. We the undersigned would like the Government to look into the prevention of these advertisements and for all potential owners to be homechecked to prevent such barbaric cruelty.
